name: Space Odyssey (itch) (superemokid)
description:
the game will be fixed later

Your team was sent to another planet to help them to establish a colony. We are tight on resources, so you’ll have to be smart and make some tough decisions. You have a diverse team of characters to take care of.

To control characters, click LMB on the character portrait and click RMB on the tile where you want them to go. 

During the events you’ll have the timer clock ticking down, so think fast.

In most decisions, you’ll have to send someone to some room or do nothing.

Используется генеративный арт в некоторых инстанциях, но 90% арта сделаны нашими артистами.
